column4: knows somebody a good way to manipulate the nameserver list when i connect a vpn with network manager?

scenario: no vpn connected, use first 127.0.0.1 ns, if it doesnt know the record use the one from dhcp. if vpn is connected try first 127.0.0.1 and if that doesnt find a record try out the one defined by vpn
I wish there was a nice way to do it. I've ended up building myself a fairly complex shell script: http://paste.ubuntu.com/603267/
thx for that, got to take a look at it... i hoped that i'm not the first who needs that and that there are already solutions i cant find
